Catalog.ResourceDescription.Name: ooi_command
Catalog.ResourceDescription.Author: Manuel Warum
Catalog.ResourceDescription.Description: This widget allows the user to issue commands to one or more objects of interests. These commands can either be basic (without parameters), or take certain data as input (eg. locations or other objects of interest). In addition, it is possible to define global commands that do not require an object of interest as an actor. Commands are able to alter the properties of objects of interests or create entirely new objects of interests.

Preference.name: useSlimCommands
Preference.description: Trims the command objects sent through the command outputendpoint to reduce overhead
Preference.label: Reduce overhead

Preference.name: resetCommands
Preference.description: When a command was issued, resets the UI to blank iff true
Preference.label: Reset command after execution
